title: Up and Down
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What goes up must come down. The book Up and Down illustrates this concept to students using familiar objects. The pictures, high-frequency words, and repetitive text support beginning readers as they read.
meta: dog, down, eyes, frog, hands, up
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Consonants : Identify words with the initial consonant Dd
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of a period at the end of a sentence
High-Frequency Words : Recognize, write, and understand the use of high-frequency words go and goes

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
